item.title: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 West to Asheville
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 West to Asheville. This intersection is a diverging diamond interchange, and is why the traffic is on the left.

item.title: NC-280 East at I-26 West/US-74 West
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26 West/US-74 West (Exit 40)

item.title: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 in Buncombe County. Merge right for I-26 East/US-74 East/Hendersonville; merge left for I-26 West/US-74 West/Asheville; continue straight on NC-280 East for Arden.

item.title: NC-280 East - Buncombe County
item.description: Welcome to Buncombe County/Leaving Henderson County on NC-280 East.

item.title: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split
item.description: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split. Turn left for NC-191 north; continue straight on NC-280 for I-26.

item.title: NC-191 North/NC-280 East - Mills River
item.description: NC-191 North/NC-280 East in Mills River

item.title: NC-280 East at NC-191 South
item.description: NC-280 East at NC-191 South. Use NC-191 south for Hendersonville; continue on NC-280 east for Asheville.
